NAEB HEADQUARTERS
i
Mrs* Winifred Coatney
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
ill Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mrs, Coatney:
Please send me if available at this time the report prepared by
Mr. James W. Sawyer and Mr. Charles M. Woodliff of Syracuse on
"Administrative policy and production procedure of formal courses
of instruction by television.
Thank you very much.
Yours sincerely,
Edward Wegener
Director
Educational Television
